author: Cleo Abram
description:
This train is driving itself, and it’s changing the way stuff gets to you! Traditional trains are great for long routes, but for smaller towns shipments can sit for days until there’s enough to justify a huge train to carry it. 

The solution? Creating autonomous trains…this is how they work. 

For more optimistic science and technology, subscribe!

#shorts #train #engineering #selfdriving #autonomous #technology
title: This New Train Drives Itself
